<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#acf9b4a8e15da976bbec9e6af79d28347">allowFP16Math</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a5709f5a9595ca8014d804f204d9dd477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a5709f5a9595ca8014d804f204d9dd477">hasMaskOperator</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PTXVersion &gt;= 71; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#affbe308a240065d6cca50264229181e6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#affbe308a240065d6cca50264229181e6">hasNoReturn</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmVersion &gt;= 30 &amp;&amp; PTXVersion &gt;= 64; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Does SM &amp; PTX support memory orderings (weak and atomic: relaxed, acquire,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// release, acq&#95;rel, sc) ?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#aef2c7b33bb315753d2d59da497aa2a1a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#aef2c7b33bb315753d2d59da497aa2a1a">hasMemoryOrdering</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmVersion &gt;= 70 &amp;&amp; PTXVersion &gt;= 60; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Does SM &amp; PTX support atomic relaxed MMIO operations ?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#ab53d4c5c6623a1a8426aef6129ca2f32"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#ab53d4c5c6623a1a8426aef6129ca2f32">hasRelaxedMMIO</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmVersion &gt;= 70 &amp;&amp; PTXVersion &gt;= 82; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a9666ae0aace22ed64bf68f3c5bf30684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a9666ae0aace22ed64bf68f3c5bf30684">hasDotInstructions</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmVersion &gt;= 61 &amp;&amp; PTXVersion &gt;= 50;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prior to CUDA 12.3 ptxas did not recognize that the trap instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// terminates a basic block. Instead, it would assume that control flow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// continued to the next instruction. The next instruction could be in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block that&#39;s lexically below it. This would lead to a phantom CFG edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// being created within ptxas. This issue was fixed in CUDA 12.3. Thus, when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PTX ISA versions 8.3+ we can confidently say that the bug will not be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// present.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#afb97398b069006a552bb959152198d58"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#afb97398b069006a552bb959152198d58">hasPTXASUnreachableBug</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PTXVersion &lt; 83; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a7e2e91b9fb92a2bf76821ef3d228ae7f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a7e2e91b9fb92a2bf76821ef3d228ae7f">hasCvtaParam</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmVersion &gt;= 70 &amp;&amp; PTXVersion &gt;= 77; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a92de14938aee2e37dea97cb18acf0261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a92de14938aee2e37dea97cb18acf0261">getFullSmVersion</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FullSmVersion; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a94c8172d9992fa53fa6a1a4128704f37"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a94c8172d9992fa53fa6a1a4128704f37">getSmVersion</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a92de14938aee2e37dea97cb18acf0261">getFullSmVersion</a>() / 10; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GPUs with &quot;a&quot; suffix have include architecture-accelerated features that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are supported on the specified architecture only, hence such targets do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// follow the onion layer model. hasAAFeatures() allows distinguishing such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GPU variants from the base GPU architecture.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - 0 represents base GPU model,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - non-zero value identifies particular architecture-accelerated variant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a65f51b58f77fc8529451aff5921e8ebd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a65f51b58f77fc8529451aff5921e8ebd">hasAAFeatures</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a92de14938aee2e37dea97cb18acf0261">getFullSmVersion</a>() % 10; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the user did not provide a target we default to the &#96;sm&#95;30&#96; target.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a2e3b091f157eb4e85d656e8fc6c999d6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a2e3b091f157eb4e85d656e8fc6c999d6">getTargetName</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetName.empty() ? </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;sm&#95;30&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> : TargetName;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#ab543f871e2a2b23291bac8f4db05a54f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#ab543f871e2a2b23291bac8f4db05a54f">hasTargetName</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !TargetName.empty(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a83868f59565d44ad1b3e42b9fffcceae">hasNativeBF16Support</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get maximum value of required alignments among the supported data types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// From the PTX ISA doc, section 8.2.3:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  The memory consistency model relates operations executed on memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  locations with scalar data-types, which have a maximum size and alignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  of 64 bits. Memory operations with a vector data-type are modelled as a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  set of equivalent memory operations with a scalar data-type, executed in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  an unspecified order on the elements in the vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a3af190b4e34d047250949ba40f686634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a3af190b4e34d047250949ba40f686634">getMaxRequiredAlignment</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 8; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emulated loops with 32-bit/64-bit CAS generate better SASS than 16-bit CAS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a73537c20d3a1c6867a203540b7095e0e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a73537c20d3a1c6867a203540b7095e0e">getMinCmpXchgSizeInBits</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 32; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a745eade6eb080487784cbf5065428a15"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxsubtarget/#a745eade6eb080487784cbf5065428a15">getPTXVersion</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PTXVersion; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
